title: Dubizzle Jobs Scraper
description: Extract job listings from Dubizzle UAE using intelligent JSON API and HTML parsing. Search by keywords, categories, or specific URLs across all Emirates.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific Dubizzle jobs URL. If provided, this overrides keyword/category/emirate settings.

keyword.title: Search Keywords
keyword.description: Search for jobs by title, skills, or keywords (e.g., 'software engineer', 'sales manager', 'accountant').

emirate.title: Emirate
emirate.description: Select the UAE emirate to search in.

collectDetails.title: Collect Full Job Details
collectDetails.description: Visit individual job pages to extract complete descriptions and additional information.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Results
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of job listings to extract. Set higher values for comprehensive searches.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Safety limit for pagination. Prevents excessive crawling on large result sets.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Configure proxy settings. Residential proxies recommended for reliability on Dubizzle.
